title: NAW - News Around the World
description: A modern, high-performance web application to stay up-to-date with the latest global news, built with Angular 20 and Server-Side Rendering (SSR). It provides a smooth user experience with support for multiple languages and dark mode.

title: Icon Bot
description: A fully customized Discord bot developed for Sica Games, designed to automate and manage entire servers with ease. It integrates advanced moderation tools, an interactive chatbot, meme generation, and dynamic role management, offering a seamless and intelligent experience for community engagement.

title: ISB Instalaciones
description: A professional WordPress website built for IBS Instalaciones, showcasing their expertise in fire protection, electrical systems, security cameras, and maintenance services.
